docs.title: Landauer-Optimizer
docs.text:
Tiny, fast optimizer that inserts mid-circuit measurements to stay within a fridge’s Landauer heat budget.

➡ Quick-start: see the next page.

docs.title: Quick-start
docs.text:
```python from qiskit import QuantumCircuit from landauer_opt import optimize

qc = QuantumCircuit(3, 3) qc.h(0); qc.cx(0,1); qc.cx(1,2)

opt, report = optimize(qc, max_cluster=2, fidelity=0.9) print(report)

Run it – you should see a list of qubits the optimiser chose to measure plus the projected Landauer heat.
